title: Actors on the Road
overview: Actors Jung Hae-in and Yim Si-wan embark on a journey of friendship against the beautiful landscapes of Scotland. They explore one of the largest producers of whiskey, where they follow the traces of history found in the different cities. As whiskey enthusiasts and same-age friends, the 2 actors showcase their real-life chemistry during their healing Scottish travels, which feature a variety of attractions such as vast nature and golf.
